snippet.title: Shattered Heaven: Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the reveal trailer for Shattered Heaven, a deckbuilding/rogue-lite RPG with a deep, multi-branching story, from the creator of the award-winning title Dry Drowning.

Pledge now on KICKSTARTER for exclusive rewards!

KICKSTARTER: https://bit.ly/ShatteredHeavenKickstarter

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://bit.ly/ShatteredHeavenSteam
